Episodes.description: After the kids find a record with Homer's picture on it, he recalls the story of how he achieved fame in the 1980s with his barbershop quartet, The Be Sharps.
Episodes.title: Homer's Barbershop Quartet

Episodes.description: After being released from prison on parole, Sideshow Bob plots to murder Bart.
Episodes.title: Cape Feare

Episodes.description: When a surprise inspection of the nuclear power plant reveals that Homer is not qualified to do his job, he is forced to go to college.
Episodes.title: Homer Goes to College

Episodes.description: Mr. Burns goes on a desperate quest to recover his cherished childhood toy Bobo, a bear which is now in Maggie's possession.
Episodes.title: Rosebud

Episodes.description: Homer sells his soul to the Devil for a donut, Bart contends with a gremlin on the side of the school bus which only he can see, and the family discovers that Mr. Burns is a vampire.
Episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror IV

Episodes.description: A girls' night out turns into a high speed chase when Marge learns her friend is driving a stolen car.
Episodes.title: Marge on the Lam

Episodes.description: Brad Goodman, a self-help guru, comes to Springfield and identifies Bart as a role model for personal happiness because he is in touch with his inner child. Soon, the entire town begins to behave like him.
Episodes.title: Bart's Inner Child

Episodes.description: After joining the Junior Campers while on a sugar high, Bart reluctantly invites Homer to accompany him on the group's annual father-son rafting trip, which soon goes awry.
Episodes.title: Boy-Scoutz 'n the Hood

Episodes.description: Homer's marriage is in trouble when he develops an attraction to a new co-worker.
Episodes.title: The Last Temptation of Homer

Episodes.description: In order to revitalize its economy, Springfield decides to legalize gambling. As a consequence, Marge becomes addicted to using slot machines, while Mr. Burns develops a Howard Hughes complex.
Episodes.title: $pringfield (Or, How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Legalized Gambling)

Episodes.description: An outbreak of burglaries inspires Homer to lead a vigilante group.
Episodes.title: Homer the Vigilante

Episodes.description: Bart becomes an overnight sensation as the "I didn't do it" boy on Krusty the Clown's show.
Episodes.title: Bart Gets Famous

Episodes.description: When Homer becomes ill after eating contaminated food bought at the Kwik-E-Mart, Apu is fired from his job.
Episodes.title: Homer and Apu

Episodes.description: Lisa leads a protest against a talking doll which she believes is sexist.
Episodes.title: Lisa vs. Malibu Stacy

Episodes.description: In an effort to increase the dismal television ratings for their space launches, NASA decides to send an ordinary man into space, and Homer is chosen for the task.
Episodes.title: Deep Space Homer

Episodes.description: After Ned Flanders invites Homer to a major football game, the pair become friends. However, Homer's possessiveness and loutish behaviour slowly turns Ned against him.
Episodes.title: Homer Loves Flanders

Episodes.description: Bart wins an elephant in a radio contest.
Episodes.title: Bart Gets an Elephant

Episodes.description: After a near-death experience, Mr. Burns realizes he has no legal heir and holds auditions to find one. Bart is eventually chosen, and Mr. Burns plots to turn him against the rest of the Simpson family.
Episodes.title: Burns' Heir

Episodes.description: Bart takes Santa's little helper to school with him on inspection day and gets Skinner fired, Bart is pleased until Ned Flanders is made his replacement. Bart sets out to find Skinner and get him reinstated.
Episodes.title: Sweet Seymour Skinner's Baadasssss Song

Episodes.description: After playing truant from school, Bart witnesses the alleged assault of a waiter by Mayor Quimby's nephew, Freddy. However, if he comes forward, he will have to admit he skipped class, and face the consequences.
Episodes.title: The Boy Who Knew Too Much

Episodes.description: Grampa falls in love with Marge's mother, but must compete with Mr. Burns for her heart.
Episodes.title: Lady Bouvier's Lover

Episodes.description: Homer begins teaching a class on how to have a successful marriage, but jeopardizes his own marriage by revealing secrets about himself and Marge.
Episodes.title: Secrets of a Successful Marriage
